name: duckdb-r-editor
description: DuckDB-focused SQL editor for R with intelligent autocomplete, schema introspection, and 500+ DuckDB function signatures. Optimized for Positron IDE.

duckdb-r-editor.duckdbPath.description: Path to DuckDB database file for schema introspection. Leave empty to auto-detect from R workspace.

duckdb-r-editor.enableAutoComplete.description: Enable DuckDB SQL autocomplete in R strings

duckdb-r-editor.enableSQLHighlighting.description: Enable lightweight DuckDB SQL syntax highlighting in R strings

duckdb-r-editor.useSemanticHighlighting.description: Enable advanced SQL highlighting with context-aware colors and full Air formatter support. Recommended for best experience. Uses efficient O(n) algorithm with minimal overhead (~1-3ms). Disable to use lighter TextMate grammar (doesn't support multi-line Air-formatted strings).
